head: Divorce Notice.
ab: TERRITORY OF WASHINGTON, Third Judical District.
Jane Richards, vs. Lewis L. Richards.
p: In the U.S. District Court, 3d Judicial District, W.T., holding terms at Seattle.

TO LEWIS L. RICHARDS:—You are hereby notified that Jane Richards has filed a complaint against you in the above named Court, which will come on to be heard heard at the first term of said Court shall commence more than four weeks after the date of the first publication of this notice: and unless you appear and answer, the Plaintiff will apply to the Court for the relief prayed for. The object and prayer of said complaint is to obtain a divorce on the ground of neglect and abandonment.
Complaint filed March 2d. 1865. Date of publication, March 4th, 1865.
ab: B. F. DENNISON Att'y for Plaintiff.
